In this course you'll learn the structure of Power Editor, how to create a campaign in Power Editor, how to create hundreds of ads fast, what metrics to use for success.

items.title: Fundamentals of earning through facebook
items.headline: A step by step guide of different strategies of earning through facebook at the comfort of your home
objectives_summary: This course consists of curated content based on various aspects and techniques of earning money through facebook. For the students of this course this course brings all these techniques in one bundle with step by step introduction of each technique and how it can be used to earn money. This course features all the necessary fundamentals of investment and skills and briefly explains how you can start earning through facebook without any investment and technical skills. This course also includes all the basics and advanced techniques of how you can use your interests and audience through various groups and group activities to build a strong foundation to support your earning from home. From learning through activities to managing your audience, this course will guide you through each and every step. This course will also explain to you various advanced concepts of earning from home including affiliate marketing and sponsorship deals.

items.title: Marketing for Voice Actors

objectives_summary: How to market voice over services directly to potential customers.

items.title: The Complete Course for Marketing & Networking on Clubhouse
items.headline: Harnessing the power of the newest social networking sensation to accelerate your personal and business goals
objectives_summary: In this course, you’ll learn what the Clubhouse app is, and how you can use it to boost your personal and professional branding. You’ll go from complete noob to expert user, and learn how to become a Clubhouse influencer or professional networker in your industry of choice. This course covers:  How to join Clubhouse How to set up a winning profile Guide to all of Clubhouse’s features How to join & start rooms How to increase your followers on Clubhouse How to use Clubhouse for marketing your business How to pitch your startup & get funded on Clubhouse
